OOC:( Quills are 4 feet long.  She has a few special quills that she 
can telescope out to be longer, about 6 feet long.)

::Spears::

She gets hit in the left back leg and one shot hits her back.  She 
lets out a blood curdling scream.  She transforms into bot mode and 
pulls a quill out of her side and extends it to a staff.  

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (How big are Spears' quills, Logo?)
> 
> Serpentor:
> 
> 
> Serpentor ducked down, two quills passing by his head, two stabbing 
into his 
> chest, a small yet steady flow of blue mech-fluid leaking from his 
chest 
> wounds.  He raised his rifle, firing off two bolts at Spears.
